sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './header.css' const Header = () => { /*========= Change background Header =============*/ window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header"); if (this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }) /*========= Toggle Menu =============*/ const [Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("#about"); return (
  • setActiveNav ('#home')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" :"nav__link"}> Home
  • About
  • Projects
  • Experience
  • Contact
) } export default Header
